features: 3-PIECE: Includes 1-cup, 2-cup, and 4-cup measuring cups that are perfect for baking, cooking, mixing and more. Dimensions for 1 cup: 6'' diameter x 4.5'' high. Dimensions for 2 cup: 6.5'' diameter x 4.5'' high. Dimensions for 4 cup: 8'' diameter x 6'' high.
EASY TO READ: Featuring bold and large measurements in both ounces and milliliters making this effortless to read.
EASY GRIP HANDLES: Adding milk to your cake batter, We got you covered. All Pyrex measuring cups feature a curved spout for non-mess pouring and easy-grip handles for comfort.

MICROWAVABLE: Need to melt a cup of butter for a batch of chocolate cookies, Just throw our Pyrex Measuring Cup in the microwave. High-quality tempered glass is dishwasher, freezer, microwave and preheated oven safe. Non-porous glass is BPA free, non-toxic and won’t absorb food odors, flavors, or stains.

PYREX IS THE #1 BRAND OF GLASS PREPWARE*: Loved for generations, experienced cooks and beginners alike have reached for Pyrex brand glassware products, because they’re affordable, durable, and great for all their cooking, serving and storing needs. Source: The NPD Group / Retail Tracking Service, dollars, 12 ME December 2022
body.description: This handy trio of measuring cups ensures you'll always have the right size on hand. Each has easy-to-read measurement markings in red for at-a-glance precision, easy-grip handles, and spouts designed for controlled pouring. And because they're made of durable Pyrex glass, you can melt ingredients like butter or chocolate right in the cup – and then pop it in the dishwasher for easy cleanup. This set includes: (1) 1-cup Measuring Cup, (1) 2-cup Measuring Cup and (1) 4-cup Measuring Cup.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Your go-to for cooking and baking adventures. At Pyrex, we celebrate a love of food and the memories around it. Let us help you make something delicious! Pyrex 3-Piece Glass Prepware Measuring Cup Set This handy trio of measuring cups ensures you'll always have the right size on hand. Each has easy-to-read measurement markings in red for at-a-glance precision, easy-grip handles, and spouts designed for controlled pouring. And because they're made of durable Pyrex glass, you can melt ingredients like butter or chocolate right in the cup – and then pop it in the dishwasher for easy cleanup. Set Includes: (1) 1 - Cup Measuring Cup (1) 2 - Cup Measuring Cup (1) 4 - Cup Measuring Cup

Pyrex 4 cup measuring cup Add a measure of consistency to your kitchen with the Pyrex 4-cup Measuring Cup that is sturdy and easy-to-read. The easy to grab handle is designed to make it easy to mix, measure and pour. Pyrex 2 cup measuring cup This Pyrex 2-cup measuring cup is a kitchen staple. A comfortable handle and curved spout make pouring liquids easy. Pyrex 1 cup measuring cup The red markings are easy to read on the clear glass. You can even heat up ingredients right in the 1-cup measuring cup, cutting down on cleanup time.
Trusted for over 100 years Best in glass

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are great measuring cups at a very low price for the set of three. Pyrex quality and great packaging for shipping. Pieces came safe and unbroken. I would recommend this product. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful sizes and quality
reviews.reviewText: Daughter loves the sizes, easy to read printing, nice color and heavy duty built to last quality. Now I want a set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stand up well to use, easy to read
reviews.reviewText: Got tired of plastic measuring cups getting cloudy and hard to read. These are solid, easy to clean, and stay clear

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classics that still work great
reviews.reviewText: I love these old-school measuring cups that I grew up with. Sturdy and stackable. Eventually, after many years of running them through the dishwasher, the print will start to fade and become hard to read, which is when I replace them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've always loved this brand. They are accurate and great quality. It comes in three sizes. 4 cup, 2, and 1. Perfect for baking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very durable, very thick, and very heavy. But worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have for those who love to cook and bake
reviews.reviewText: I've wanted this set for the longest time but kept putting off as I have others, this set is very hard to beat, very sturdy, stores wells, easy to read, pour spout....quality measuring cups!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are great measuring cups. A must have if your a baker. I have a set for myself and recently bought my brother a set for his wedding gift.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelentes! Se ven super resistentes y muy exactas
reviews.reviewText: Me llegaron en buenas condiciones, se ven de muyyy buena resistencia, espero que me duren muchos años. Me encantaron, si pueden comprenlas no se arrepentiran.

Pyrex has been around for a long time.Their products tend to be of the highest quality possible.For example the graduation markings on the measuring cups last an extremely long time. Not something you find with plastic measuring cups.Pyrex can be used in hot or cold applications which is handy for use at home or commercially.This set of 3 measuring cups by Pyrex I suspect will last me a very long time and I was able to purchase them at Amazon for a very reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 29, 2018
reviews.reviewText: usual pyrex quality at a reasonable price

reviews.reviewTitle: Three measuring cup are very useful, good to melt chocolate in microwave
reviews.reviewText: Three measuring cup are very useful, good to melt chocolate in microwave.can measure liquids while cooking.good for mixing liquids like oil ,egg, milk etc.while baking .very handy .
Extremely satisfied with the quality and price. Everyone needs a set in a kitchen for a lifetime
